entry.title: Cut and Run
entry.summary:
Author: Bubbling24

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 111,035Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 329

Summary: In a city like Gotham, information is currency. And you've made a career out of getting people to talk.Not by force. Not with threats. Just a salon chair, a mirror, and the kind of silence that makes people fill it with secrets. Affairs. Deals. Who’s moving into which block. Who’s gone missing. Who’s about to.You’re not a vigilante. You don’t wear a mask. You just know when something’s about to crack - and lately, Gotham’s been humming like a live wire.And you weren’t supposed to matter. Not to anyone.And especially not to the man who just blew up a bar because you said it gave you a bad feeling.

entry.title: Hangman's Trick // J. Todd
entry.summary:
Author: themoonunderstandsmyneeds

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,154Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 10

Summary: They were the best of friends, the girl and the boy from the slums. Sleepovers, training sessions, reading together, playing board games, missions, secrets, traumas, movie nights, video games, there was little they didn't do together. Until he died. Sixteen years old and in the grave. Fourteen years old and lost in grief. Seven years have passed and it's time for Jason to finally pay her a visit. ( A/N: not the best summary but you get the point lol. don't expect this to be a comic accurate story. i will do my best to keep characters how they are represented in their media but i'm not holding myself to any particular story line. consider this an AU if you will. please check TW's. i will put chapter specific ones in the notes at the start of every chapter but for the first chapter i will try and cover all the potential triggers this story will cover. anyways, essentially this is a story where you are jason's childhood best friend, who isn't aware that he is alive. don't expect everything to make perfect sense, we will gain more backstory as we progress. enjoy xx.)

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,674Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 65

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.
